headline: An AI super-bull who just backed the Nvidia-Groq deal warns of a data center bust: ‘We foresee a significant financial crisis’
summary: Alex Davis says third-party data-center developers will eventually be jilted by the hyperscalers they serve, and face a subsequent debt crisis.

raw.headline: An AI super-bull who just backed the Nvidia-Groq deal warns of a data center bust: ‘We foresee a significant financial crisis’
raw.summary: Alex Davis says third-party data-center developers will eventually be jilted by the hyperscalers they serve, and face a subsequent debt crisis.

headline: Ireland Colocation Data Center Portfolio Report 2025: Detailed Analysis of 37 Existing Data Centers, 22 Upcoming Data Centers and 25 Operators/Investors
summary: Explore the expansive Ireland data center market with our comprehensive Excel database, offering in-depth analysis of 37 existing and 22 upcoming data centers. Covering key locations like Dublin, Cork, and Belfast, this resource details vital metrics such as white-floor space, IT load capacities, and retail colocation pricing. Dominated by operators like Digital Realty and Equinix, Ireland is set for major growth, with upcoming IT power capacity exceeding 1 GW—tripling current availability. Idea
